mapper.select: SELECT reply.REPLY_NO , reply.MEM_NO , reply.TYPE_CODE , reply.ITEM_NO , reply.REPLY_CONTENT , reply.REPLY_WRITER_NAME , reply.REPLY_WRITE_DATE , reply.USE_YN , member.MEM_PROFILE_PHOTO FROM TBL_COMMON_REPLY reply, TBL_MEMBER member WHERE reply.MEM_NO = member.MEM_NO AND reply.TYPE_CODE = #{type_code} AND reply.ITEM_NO = #{item_no} AND reply.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY REPLY_WRITE_DATE ASC
